Content:
I regularly find myself curious about your area of operation ...
Are we likely to see each other in meat space or is meta-space our only likely contact?
When you talk about your weather and/or riding conditions, whereabouts are those?
I can learn a lot more about motorcycling in various places when you include some idea of where on Earth your tale comes from.

I appreciate fellow forum-ites who include location information in their signature or profile ... or both.

I encourage you to make some effort to give your fellows an idea of where you roll primarily.

Title: location, location, location ... where are you?
Author: Bitterroot Bugler
